Blackfriars Railway Bridge is a location in Watch Dogs: Legion.

Location[]

SYSTEM ERROR DETECTED:

This article or section contains insufficient information and is considered a Stub. You can help by expanding it as much as you can.

Appearances[]

Watch Dogs: Legion[]

The railway bridge appears in the game, but has no significant importance to the main storyline. As a result of the bombings that heavily damaged the nearby TOAN Conference, the railway bridge heading into Blackfriars station was destroyed, and the bridge near the conference collapsed as a result. When Albion issued a curfew, all train services in and out of the city were suspended and the station was closed.

Bloodline[]

The station appears at the end of Faster than L33T, when Wrench has to fly a drone through the Southwark borough and to the finish line just above the TOAN Conference.
